definition: a sheet of any written or printed material (especially in a manuscript or book), produce leaves, of plants
details:
noun
- a sheet of any written or printed material (especially in a manuscript or book)
= synonyms: folio
- the main organ of photosynthesis and transpiration in higher plants
= synonyms: foliage
- hinged or detachable flat section, as of a table or door
= example: hinged or detachable flat section, as of a table or door
verb
- produce leaves, of plants
- turn over pages
= example: turn over pages
- look through a book or other written material
= synonyms: riffle
